# api-observability-setup-axiom-pino-sentry

Pino, Axiom, Sentry installation - one-time project setup for logging and error tracking with source maps upload

## Tags

`pino` `axiom` `sentry` `setup` `installation` `logging`

## Installation

Add this plugin to your Claude Code configuration:

```json
{
  "plugins": ["api-observability-setup-axiom-pino-sentry"]
}
```

## Usage

This skill is automatically available when installed.
